ContentDesc_Pilgers Pfad (Ebenen 81-90): The return of night to Norvrandt should have brought peaceful slumber to the Church of the First Light, but within its ruined chapels crawls an uneasy horde of sin eaters. With the aid of the faerie king, you must venture down the pilgrim road to attend an unlikely funeral and grant eternal rest to all who yet yearn for oblivion.
